title: Arthrosamid® Knee Hydrogel Injection
description: A single hydrogel injection that integrates into the synovial lining, providing up to three years of pain relief for arthritic knees.
longDescription: Arthrosamid® is a non-biodegradable hydrogel that bonds with the synovial membrane, creating a soft, cushioning layer inside the knee joint. Unlike steroids or hyaluronic acid, it doesn’t wash away. Our consultants deliver Arthrosamid® under ultrasound guidance, tailoring placement to your cartilage wear so you regain confidence in every step.

overview.title: Why Arthrosamid® Works
overview.content: Arthrosamid® is a polyacrylamide hydrogel approved for knee osteoarthritis. Once injected into the joint, it integrates with the synovial membrane, improving viscosity, cushioning cartilage, and reducing inflammatory pain. Clinical studies show sustained relief for up to three years.
highlights: Ideal for moderate to severe knee OA
Quick recovery and no hospital stay
